application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Mature Goat Willow (applicants ref. T1) - Approximately 8.00m.  Remove 1 x stem to the front of the stem cluster.  Reduce lateral and sub lateral branches overhanging the lawn and beds back to suitable growth points or branch collars (approximately 1.50m).  Reduce remaining crown back to previous and most recent reduction points whilst preserving a suitable amount of furnishing growth to ensure even crown continuity.  Remove dead wood.1 x Prunus (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 5.00m.  Thin crown density by approximately 20%.  Reduce over long branches back into main crown structure effectively reducing the crown by approximately 1.20m.  Remove dead wood.1 x Cypress (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 7.00m.  Reduce crown height by up to 1.50m.  Trim lateral and sub lateral growth to tidy and control encroachment by approximately 1.20m.
